creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: nicely done; three-sided frame of alternating rows of batik and embroidery; center is a rectangular batik pocket; blue, white, red, green and yellow; navy blue band and lining; woven ties
title: Apron
